FwkSenCnt.MEANING: device which magnifies the appearance of sth

ExCnt.EX: Not every blind or visually impaired person can read Braille . A lot of people prefer to read large text , listen to tapes or make use of magnifiers or specialist technology
It could be possible that users of screen magnifiers might overlook some of the text , not realising it was there .
The LRC has a text magnifier , hearing loop and a low-level photocopier .
While the fly continues its fight against death , I search for my father's stamp magnifier to examine this tiny drosophila .
This handy pocket magnifier with plastic lenses offers a choice of 3x , 5x , 6x and 10x magnification values .
If you have a craft , hobby or do any kind of close work , this desktop magnifier will give you all the details , leaving your hands free to make and mend .
